Text:
You really ought to upgrade to a modern bit torrent client, such as uTorrent or Vuze.
The old BitComet crap that you created this torrent with has been obsolete for years.

BitComet works far better than the latest versions of Utorrent which I gave up on. Hung all the time. Oh, I am not the only one. Lots of people have abandoned uTorrent. Vuze is crap, IMO.

BTW, this is my first UP in ages, so it there is a problem (other than a crappy Asian Internet connection) downloading, let me know and I'll see what I can do.

OK - I see what you mean - the padding files. Downloading with Bitcomet is no problem, but that is not good. I will redo the torrent with Utorrent shortly.

Sorry - everyone!

Velvet, 
If it is not a problem, you should delete this. I have done a new torrent file and uploaded it already.
